#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int t,i,l;
char s1[100001];
 int main()
 {
     scanf("%d",&t);

     while(t--)
     {
         scanf("%s",s1);
         l=strlen(s1);
         for(i=l/2-1;i>=0;i--)
            cout<<s1[i];

         for(i=l-1;i>=l/2;i--)
            cout<<s1[i];
        cout<<endl;


     }


return 0;
}
